title: VoiceInk
description:
VoiceInk is an opensource voice-to-text app for macOS that transcribes what you say to text almost instantly with near-perfect accuracy. 

Voicelnk uses local AI models to transcribe your speech to text. So you will be able to work even when you do not have an internet connection. All of your data is safely stored locally; no data leaves your device unless you opt-in for AI enhancement.
